course_details.highlights:
1. FLOW measurement
- Magnetic Flowmeter technology
- Mass Flowmeter technology
- Ultrasonic Flowmeter technology (Inline & Clamp-O-
2. LEVEL measurement
- Ultrasonic Level Technology
- Radar Level Technology
- Capacitance Level Technology
3. PRESSURE Measurement
4. TEMPERATURE Measurement
5. ELECTROPENUMATIC POSITIONER
Topics for all the above Measurements.
-Various Technology
-Working Principles
-Product overview
-Live demo & Hands-on trial for Pressure, Temperature & Positioners, etc.
course_details.technique_skills:
Prerequisites
Diploma / Degree students in Electrical /Electronics/Instrumentation/ENTC/Biomedical/ Mechanical Engineering

course.course_sublinks: Electrical Engineering | Mechatronics | Application Engineer | Automotive | Engineering Graduate

course_details.highlights:
Course Contents:

System overview consisting of Software & component of WinCC, Runtime options & licensing along with system requirements.

Configuration of software using different interfacing options available like different views & windows.

Creation of the project and setting up the connection with the controller. Checking Device configurations & Runtime settings.

Basics steps required for configuration like screen layout, using different object on screens.

- A brief introduction on Runtime scripting & making objects dynamic using System functions.

- User & System defined Alarm, the configuration of messages in the alarm system.

- Creating Users, assigning security to objects using User administration.

- Logging of cyclic/acyclic data using Tag logging.

- Recipe Management for storing different sets of data.

- Migration of older version project to TIA portal.

Prerequisite:

Basic Knowledge of TIA Portal software & Automation technology / relay logic.

Target Group:

Engineers in Instrumentation / Electrical / Electronics / Engineering.

course.course_name: Basics of Measuring instruments - Profile projector, Microscope & instruments
